original: Lindström, Uno Mauritz Marion, ingenjör, Norrköping, f. 28/4/07 i Jakobstad, Finl, av fabr. A. L. o. Mar}^ Lagergrén. G. m. Peggy Löfström. Barn i föreg. äkt.: Bo f. 41, Lars 43. — Genomg. Norrköp. tekn. gymn. Stud:res. t. Tyskl. 27-28, Engl. 32. Anst. v. A-B Abel Lindströms Tricot-fabr. i Norrköp. sed. 28, num. föret, verkst. dir.
translated: Lindström, Uno Mauritz Marion, engineer, Norrköping, born April 28, 1907 in Jakobstad, Finland, son of factory owner A. L. and Mar}^ Lagergrén. Married to Peggy Löfström. Children from previous marriage: Bo, born in 1941, Lars, born in 1943. Attended Norrköping technical high school. Studied abroad in Germany during 1927-1928, and in England during 1932. Employed by A-B Abel Lindström's Tricot factory in Norrköping since 1928, currently holding the position of executive director.
